name: tm16
effect: Teaches Light Screen to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Light Screen to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Icy Wind Gen I: Pay Day)

flavor_text.sun-moon: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.
